title: Online Font Previewer
content:
Pretty comfortable and useful for a quick preview of fonts installed on your own system:   
 [http://www.stcassociates.com/lab/fontbrowser.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154228/http:/www.stcassociates.com/lab/fontbrowser.html)

 [‹ Japanese kanji font collections?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154228/http:/www.typophile.com/node/3079 "Go to previous forum topic") [Typography dreams ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154228/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2975 "Go to next forum topic")
author: unclickable

comments.content:
Thanks Michael.   
Pretty good. This software can be used also in Japanese.
